snippet: Jacoby Ellsbury and Brett Gardner, the head of the batting order, have been responsible for getting the Yankees early leads. Relievers Dellin Betances and Andrew Miller have cemented them.
abstract: New York Yankees have American League-best record of 21-12 largely by virtue of strong hitters at top and bottom of their lineup; lead-off pair of Jacoby Ellsbury and Brett Gardner have helped team gain early leads, while Dellin Betances and Andrew Miller have helped cement leads on back end.
lead_paragraph: Jacoby Ellsbury and Brett Gardner, the head of the batting order, have been responsible for getting the Yankees early leads. Relievers Dellin Betances and Andrew Miller have cemented them.

headline.main: Yankees’ Routine: Two Set Table, and Two Others Wipe the Floor Clean
headline.print_headline: Yankees’ Routine: 2 Set Table, 2 Wipe Floor Clean
